name: Age
text: How old are you?
use for communities of type(s): neighborhood, interest or support group, family

name: Gender
text: What is your gender?
use for communities of type(s): neighborhood, interest or support group, family

name: How long lived here
text: How long have you lived in this community?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: 6 months or less, 6 months to a year, 1 to 2 years, 2 to 5 years, 5 to 10 years, 10 to 20 years, 20 to 30 years, more than 30 years

name: Where live
text: Where do you live?
help: Enter any sort of location you like, specific or vague.

name: Feel about community
text: How do you feel about this community?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: great, good, okay, not so great, bad, awful

name: How interested
text: How interested would you say you are in this topic?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: extremely, very, moderately, not much, not at all

name: Why interested
text: What made you want to join this group?

name: Want to get
text: What do you want to get out of this group?

name: How long involved
text: How long have you been involved with this issue?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: 6 months or less, 6 months to a year, 1 to 2 years, 2 to 5 years, 5 to 10 years, 10 to 20 years, 20 to 30 years, more than 30 years

name: How long working
text: How long have you been working in this group?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: 6 months or less, 6 months to a year, 1 to 2 years, 2 to 5 years, 5 to 10 years, 10 to 20 years, 20 to 30 years, more than 30 years

name: Position
text: What is your position in this work group?

name: Type of work
text: What sorts of work do you do in the group?

name: Talk to
text: Who would you say you talk to most often?

name: Children
text: How many children do you have, if any?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: none, one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, more than ten

name: Live closest to
text: Who do you live the closest to?

name: How feel about
text: How does this make you feel?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: happy, enthused, hopeful, relieved,  indifferent, confused, sad, angry, frustrated, hopeless, grateful, amazed, no feeling named here

name: Reason
text: Why was this contributed?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: to inform, to help, to persuade, to praise, to criticize, to entertain, to reminisce, for fun, for a reason not listed here

name: When happened
text: Approximately when did this story happen?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: today, this week, within the past month, a few months ago, several months ago, a year ago, 2-5 years ago, 6-10 years ago, 11-20 years ago, more than 20 years ago, I'm not sure

name: Where came from
text: To whom did this story happen?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: to the person who told the story, to another person who told it to the storyteller, to someone the storyteller knows, the teller heard it around, everyone knows it, I'm not sure

name: Will remember
text: How long do you think you will remember the events that happened in this story?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: for as long as I live, for a very long time, for a while but it will fade, not for very long, only briefly, what story?

name: Strength
text: How strong would you say this pattern is?
choices or min-max or boolean "yes" text: barely there, very weak, weak, moderate, pretty strong, very strong, overwhelming
help: How much does the pattern stand out?

name: Observations
text: What pattern do you see?
help: Please describe what is noteworthy, confining yourself to facts that anyone could agree on.

name: Interpretations
text: What do you think this pattern means?
help: Venture an opinion on why the pattern appears the way it does.

name: Implications
text: What do you think should be done about this pattern?
help: If this pattern represents a problem, what can be done about it? If it represents and opportunity, what can be done to benefit from it?

name: Useful to
text: To whom do you think this collage will be useful?

name: Refers to
text: Is this collage in reference to an event, person, place, time, or thing?
help: Is there anything this collage is about in particular?

name: Refers to
text: Is this invitation in reference to an event, person, place, time, or thing?
help: Is there anything this invitation asks about in particular?

name: Who should respond
text: Who in particular should respond to this invitation?
help: Is there any group of people who would best be able to respond to this invitation?

name: Source
text: Where did this resource come from?

name: Further info
text: Where should people look if they need more information related to this resource?
